standards.name: Variable Naming
standards.description: Use descriptive and meaningful names for variables.

standards.name: Indentation
standards.description: Use consistent indentation with 2 or 4 spaces.

standards.name: Function Declarations
standards.description: Use function declarations instead of function expressions.

standards.name: Comments
standards.description: Use comments to explain complex logic or provide context.
examples: // This function calculates the sum of two numbers.

standards.name: Error Handling
standards.description: Handle errors gracefully and provide meaningful error messages.
examples: // Code that may throw an error

standards.name: Accessing Local/Session Storage
standards.description: Access local or session storage using globalCommonUtilityService.getValueFromStorageXXX.
